name: Rabid Air Sprinters
description:
Rabid Air Sprinters!

4 Characters, 2 stages!

Build up tension between you and your opponent in order to launch your enemy off the stage. Each character has a unique trait, which changes the way you play.

2 Players!
Player 1: W/A/D.  F to attack, Space to jump, R for special ability (if applicable)
Player 2: Arrow Keys + RCtrl to attack, RShift for special ability (if applicable)

Artists:
UP887421 - Erin Bateman
UP899468 - Naomi Sam

Programmers
UP903258 - Ricky James
UP903053 - Andrei Telerez
UP901210 - Anita Dann


[Rabid Air Sprinters is both the team name, and the game name]
